trans-unit.source: Contains information about an area of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control or a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>.
<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo> is returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> class when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.HitTest%2A> method is called.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> located at the position indicated by the hit test.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem"></xref> located at the position indicated by the hit test.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> at the position indicated by a hit test on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>.
This value will be `null` if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> does not contain items or the position indicated is not on an item.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> at the position indicated by a hit test on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>.
Gets the location of a hit test on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control, in relation to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> and the items it contains.

This property will return <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestLocations.None> if the hit test indicates a position that is within the client area of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> but is not located on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem"></xref> at the position indicated by a hit test on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>.
This value will be `null` if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> does not contain subitems or the position indicated is not on a subitem.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem"></xref> at the position indicated by a hit test on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>.
